on reading compounds: 犯【ハン】perpetrators of (some) crime, (some type of) crime
犯行【ハンコウ】crime, criminal act, offence, offense
防犯【ボウハン】prevention of crime, security (device, camera, etc.)
違犯【イハン】offense (against the law), offence, violation
重犯【ジュウハン】felony, major offence, felon, old offender
kun reading compounds: 犯す【おかす】to commit (e.g. crime), to perpetrate, to make (e.g. mistake), to break (e.g. rule), to violate, to transgress, to contravene, to rape, to violate, to ravish, to deflower
